main_definition: Twelve is a number, the cardinal form of twelve, which represents one more than eleven and one less than thirteen.

meanings_and_examples.example: When kids hit their twelfth birthday, they often start second grade.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unit of measurement in some systems
A group or series formed by twelve individual units
meanings_and_examples.example: The team was made up of twelve players, including their captain who scored the winning goal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Twelfth in a sequence or cycle (often referring to months)
meanings_and_examples.example: We will have our annual meeting on the twelfth month, December.
He was born in the twelfth year of the decade.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Food portion (often used for pies or pastries)
meanings_and_examples.example: We ordered a dozen cookies and twelve slices of cake from the bakery.
A full rotation on Earth takes approximately 24 hours, or two twelves.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The term 'a dozen' referring to a group of twelve
meanings_and_examples.example: She sold her goods by the dozen at the local market.
